com.datastax.dse.driver.api.core.data.geometry

Interface Geometry

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LineString, Point, Polygon

    public interface Geometry
    The driver-side representation for a DSE geospatial type. 
         Row row = dseSession.execute("SELECT coords FROM points_of_interest WHERE name = 'Eiffel Tower'").one();
     Point coords = row.get("coords", Point.class);
    The default implementations returned by the driver are immutable and serializable. If you write your own implementations, they should at least be thread-safe; serializability is not mandatory, but recommended for use with some 3rd-party tools like Apache Spark ™.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String asGeoJson()
      Returns a JSON representation of this geospatial type.
      ByteBuffer asWellKnownBinary()
      Returns a Well-known Binary (WKB) representation of this geospatial type.
      String asWellKnownText()
      Returns a Well-known Text (WKT) representation of this geospatial type.
      boolean contains(Geometry other)
      Tests whether this geospatial type instance contains another instance.

    • Method Detail

      • asWellKnownText

        @NonNull
String asWellKnownText()
        Returns a Well-known Text (WKT) representation of this geospatial type.

      • asWellKnownBinary

        @NonNull
ByteBuffer asWellKnownBinary()
        Returns a Well-known Binary (WKB) representation of this geospatial type.

        Note that, due to DSE implementation details, the resulting byte buffer always uses little-endian order, regardless of the platform's native order.

      • asGeoJson

        @NonNull
String asGeoJson()
        Returns a JSON representation of this geospatial type.

      • contains

        boolean contains(@NonNull
                 Geometry other)
        Tests whether this geospatial type instance contains another instance.
        Parameters:
        other - the other instance.
        Returns:
        whether this contains other.
